name: Duong Dinh Duc
headerTaglineFour: Based in Ho Chi Minh, VietNam
aboutpara: I'm a Android Engineer with 3 years of software development experience. In that time, I've had the opportunity to grow my skills working on a range of products with a wide variety of technology. My passion is using and sharing the knowledge I've gained over the years and continuing to learn from others through collaboration.

resume.description:
As an experienced Android developer with over 3 years of proven expertise in designing, developing, and maintaining cutting-edge mobile applications, my goal is to continue pushing the boundaries of mobile technology. I am dedicated to delivering high-quality, user-centric apps that not only meet client expectations but also set industry standards.
I am seeking a challenging role where I can leverage my experience, collaborate with cross-functional teams, and stay at the forefront of mobile development to create innovative and impactful solutions.

experiences.role: Bug fixing, Develop new feature by using Jetpack compose within Kotlin, Using Appium with Nodejs to testing UI automatically, Using UI test library to test jetpack compose layout
experiences.bullets: Clean Architect with MVVM, Jetpack Compose, Navigation Compose, Coroutines, Retrofit, Dagger Hilt, Material UI 3

experiences.role: Bug fixing, Using material UI to develop new UI in new features, Handle API calling in new features, Handle notification when transactions is successful and failed.
experiences.bullets: Kotlin, MVVM, RXJAVA, Dagger 2, Navigation Component, Material UI, Retrofit 2, using multiple repository to manage code.
